## Summary

A clear description of the maintenance task or chore.

## Type of Chore

Select the type:

- [ ] **Dependency Update** - Update packages/dependencies
- [ ] **Refactoring** - Code cleanup without changing behavior
- [ ] **CI/CD** - Build/deployment pipeline changes
- [ ] **Configuration** - Config file updates
- [ ] **Cleanup** - Remove dead code, fix warnings
- [ ] **Other** - Describe below

## Tasks

- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3

## Impact

What areas of the codebase will be affected?

## Testing Required

How should this change be verified?

## Additional Context

Add any other context about the chore here.
